title: Dink and Daisy
description: Dink and Daisy is a story of one not so cute ox-eye daisy (Dink) and a slender beautiful Gerbera daisy (Daisy), who were accidentally planted in the wrong place and it seemed they would never be noticed by their owner the (Barton's).Their story shows how we need to bloom where we are planted and life has a way of working out for our good.Short fiction with powerful meaning !
author: Joyce  Mitchell
